errors.title: Oops! Something went wrong
errors.message: We couldn’t load the payments. Please try again later.

seo.title: Payment Management – Paris 2024 Olympic Ticketing
seo.description: Manage order payments for the Paris 2024 Olympic and Paralympic events. View payment history, filter by status and method, and download invoices.

payments.title: Payment Management
payments.download_not_ready: The invoice isn’t ready yet. Please try again later.
payments.download_not_available: The invoice is not available for this payment.
payments.download_not_available_generic: The invoice is currently unavailable for this payment.
payments.refund_info: You must refund the full payment amount. Don’t forget to mark the corresponding tickets as refunded.
payments.refund_error: An error occurred while processing the refund. Please try again.

snackbar.pending_message: The payment is pending. The invoice will be available once the payment is confirmed.
snackbar.failed_message: The payment failed. No invoice is available.
